channel.title: Agro attack
channel.description:
I'm not sure if agro is a term in runescape but it simply means the NPCs attack players within a certain range. I have noticed that no Private Servers have this, and since its a very important feature for a realistic server, is there anyway this can be achieved?
I can use any server source and have some scripting experience, so any ideas/help???
P.S. Even if you don't have any ideas just post some info on what the best server would be to use, ANY posting is appreciated.
